header.title: wxBitmapDataObject

description.p: wxBitmapDataObject is a specialization of wxDataObject for bitmap data. It can be used without change to paste data into the wxClipboard or a wxDropSource (not implemented in wx). A user may wish to derive a new class from this class for providing a bitmap on-demand in order to minimize memory consumption when offering data in several formats, such as a bitmap and GIF.
This class may be used as is, but getBitmap/1 may be overridden to increase efficiency.
See: Overview dnd, wxDataObject, wxDataObjectSimple (not implemented in wx), wxFileDataObject, wxTextDataObject, wxDataObject
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxDataObject
